text: Ali Kirunda Kivejinja (12 June 1935 â€“ 19 December 2020), more commonly known as Kirunda Kivejinja, was a Ugandan politician. He was the senior presidential advisor to the President of Uganda, Yoweri Museveni. He was the Second Deputy Prime Minister and Minister of East African Community Affairs from 2016 until his death. Kivejinja died of COVID-19 on 19 December 2020 in Kampala, Uganda at the age of 85.Minister Kivejinja succumbed to Covid-19 - Museveni ==References== Category:1935 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Ugandan politicians Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Uganda
title: Kirunda Kivejinja
